name: Nemesis Realms
description: Be the massive raid boss in VR, smacking heroes around with your awesome powers. Be a multi-headed dragon spewing fire, or an arcane entity wielding the power to tear down worlds. Only possible in the ultimate VR bossfight game: Nemesis Realms!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
